name: @geekagency/react-forms
description: Hooks for handling forms in react

scripts.build: rm -rf ./lib; node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js --out-dir lib ./src && node lib/index.js && cp package.json ./lib
scripts.build:raw: rm -rf ./lib; cp -a ./src ./lib && node lib/index.js && cp package.json ./lib
scripts.bundle:preact: npx rollup -e react,preact,preact/hooks -f cjs --exports named --preserveModules -d dist/preact/cjs dist/preact/*.js
scripts.bundle:react: npx rollup -e react,preact,preact/hooks -f cjs --exports named --preserveModules -d dist/react/cjs dist/react/*.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run pack:react && npm run pack:preact && npm run bundle:preact && npm run bundle:react
